authors.author: Edmund S. Lorenz Jeremiah E. Rankin

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus.
He is a Friend that's well known.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
You have no other
Such a friend or brother.
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Are you weary,
Are you heavy hearted?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Are you grieving
Over joys departed?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Do the tears flow down
Your cheeks unbidden?
Tell it to Jesus,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Tell it to Jesus.
Have you sins that
To men's eyes are hidden?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Do you fear the
Gathering clouds of sorrow?
Tell it to Jesus,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Tell it to Jesus.
Are you anxious
What shall be tomorrow?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Are you troubled
At the thought of dying?
Tell it to Jesus,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Tell it to Jesus.
For Christ's coming kingdom
Are you sighing?
Tell it to Jesus alone.
